FileFormat.FormatName: Adobe Portable Document Catalog Index File
FileFormat.FormatDescription: Adobe Portable Document Catalog Index File (PDX) is the format of a file created when an index is built for a collection of PDF documents defined as a catalog in Adobe Acrobat Pro versions 2.0 and later, allowing users to search through the contents of the catalogue.
